attacks_and_spellcasting.name: Longsword
attacks_and_spellcasting.notes: Versatile (1d10). Can be wielded one or two-handed.

attacks_and_spellcasting.name: Longsword (Two-Handed)
attacks_and_spellcasting.notes: Versatile weapon used with two hands.

features_and_traits.name: Fighting Style: Defense
features_and_traits.description: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. (Already included in AC calculation)

features_and_traits.name: Second Wind
features_and_traits.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

features_and_traits.name: Action Surge
features_and_traits.description: Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

features_and_traits.name: Improved Critical
features_and_traits.description: Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

features_and_traits.name: Extra Attack
features_and_traits.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features_and_traits.name: Great Weapon Master
features_and_traits.description: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action. Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage.

features_and_traits.name: Military Rank
features_and_traits.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank.

equipment.name: Longsword
equipment.description: A well-balanced blade with the crest of the Stormwind regiment etched into the crossguard.

equipment.name: Shield
equipment.description: A sturdy wooden shield reinforced with iron bands, bearing battle scars from countless engagements.

equipment.name: Chain Mail
equipment.description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings, issued during military service.

equipment.name: Handaxe
equipment.description: Light throwing axes kept on the belt for ranged options.

equipment.name: Longbow
equipment.description: A recurve longbow for hunting and ranged combat.

equipment.name: Arrows
equipment.description: Standard arrows in a leather quiver.

equipment.name: Explorer's Pack
equipment.description: Contains a bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, torches, rations, and waterskin.

equipment.name: Military Insignia
equipment.description: A bronze medallion marking rank as a Sergeant in the King's Guard.
